sectionTwoContentText: A Home that makes you do work is pass√©. A Home that expects you to take care of it, is a thing of yesterday. A Home that not smart is a compromise.
wirelessFeatureText: eGlu's patended wireless technology with benchmark range of communication.
scalableFeatureText: Start with what you need and expand when you have new requirements.
affordableFeatureText: Experience the luxury of a Smart Home at the cost of a Smart Phone.
singleAppFeatureText: One APP for all your needs like security automation and survillance.
retrofitFeatureText: No change to your existing electrical wirings and no breaking of your walls.
easyToUseFeatureText: Simple and intuitive mobile APP with amazing features to smarten your home.
sectionFourContentText: We have launched eGlu Smart Home Products and they are available for purchase. You can buy pre-configured DIY kits or buy individual units and install them based on your requirements.
sectionFiveContentText: A Smart Home has endless possibilities and we want you to enjoy the whole experience.
sectionSixPromoText: Get started with Alexa and Google
sectionSixContentText: Say Hii to Google Assistant and Alexa and make your life exciting and easier.
